attributes.action: Make poaching illegal for any UK citizen anywhere in the world not just the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Poachers constantly post pictures on social media boasting and showing off with what they have killed with no consequences lets make a stand against this, show that the UK really is a country of animal lovers and show it is not acceptable
attributes.background: Based on recent events in Africa, concerning Cecil the Lion it has been clear that poaching goes on at the cost of life to those animals for no reason other than personal gratification, these animals are dying out in great numbers and something needs to be done.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105335

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
